pasugiya ayawaya maginuth rupiyal miliyana gananak mema kshethraya sadaha laba di thibenawa.ada aatha palathwala dushkara pasal wala dudaruwan pariganakayen daskam dakwanawa.krida pittaniyata wada ada pasal daruwan pariganakagarayata alum karanawa. rate thorathuru thakshana kshethraye wishala pibidimak ada athiwi thibenawa ehi wadi gaurawaya himi wenna oone shri lanka thorathuru ha sanniwedana thakshana niyojithayathanayatayi.samanyayen wipakshayen hodak ahanna asiruyi.
